alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 11:46AM CST until February 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Less than one-half inch of sleet and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...In Arkansas, Clay and Greene Counties. In Missouri, Dunklin and Pemiscot Counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 2 PM this afternoon to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
